title: Hello riot how are you :)

replies.body: Hi there, I'm good.  :D  How are you?  Yes, the mouseover information is currently disabled and is a known issue.  We'll be providing updates on the [status update page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) until it's back up.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Thanks for the reply and im doing well :)
